description:
# DAILY AI NEWS

## QUARTER HOUR AI NEWS SUMMARY

### Most Notable Summary of the Hour
- Amazon is suing Perplexity for using an AI shopping agent that allegedly breaches its terms by disguising itself as a user, putting up legal challenges regarding session control and unauthorized access. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986198105679909160)

- Apple is reportedly striking a $1 billion annual deal with Google to use its Gemini model for Siri updates, introducing features like summarizing and planning in its codenamed project Linwood. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986165995761754130)
  
### Interesting Products, Services, Research Papers, and GitHub Repos
- **Google’s Project Suncatcher** aims to use TPUs in orbit powered by sunlight for AI model training, potentially solving energy and cooling issues faced by terrestrial data centers. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986167341483450673)

- Researchers are exploring **AI-driven 3D asset generation** via StyleSculptor, improving control over content creation. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986160157760606304)
  
### Opinions & Trends Forming Around Current Events
- AI has enhanced dating apps like Tinder and Bumble, leading to smarter matching algorithms that improve user experience and retention at a time when market values of these companies face significant downturns. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986156623648477563)

- There’s a growing concern regarding AI benchmarking as a new Stanford + Oxford study reveals flaws and calls for better practices to validate AI performance metrics. [Read More](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986171557027397835)

# DAILY AI NEWS

## QUARTER HOUR AI NEWS SUMMARY

### - BULLETPOINTS OF MOST NOTABLE SUMMARY OF THE HOUR
- Apple is negotiating a significant deal with Google, expected to pay nearly $1 billion yearly for the use of the 1.2 trillion parameter Gemini AI model to enhance Siri. This move aims to improve Siri’s capabilities for tackling complex queries. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986260703272219110)
- Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang warns that "China is going to win the AI race" due to lower operational costs and less regulatory friction compared to the U.S. He emphasized the importance of cheaper power and incentives for local data centers. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986256835423383613)
- Stability AI has reportedly won a significant lawsuit against Getty Images regarding copyright issues, leading to the dismissal of secondary infringement claims. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986273285928329302)

### - BULLETPOINTS OF INTERESTING PRODUCTS, SERVICES, RESEARCH PAPERS and/or GIT HUB REPOS
- New research outlines "Context Engineering 2.0", focusing on improving AI's understanding of human intent through better contextual management across development stages. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986272136504201676)
- A starter template for Hono on Cloudflare Workers that includes authentication and ORM has been released, facilitating easier cloud-based app development. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986280457911091660)
- Perplexity’s research paper highlights new software that enables 1-trillion-parameter AI models to run efficiently on AWS GPUs, enhancing large-scale model deployment capabilities. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986254090234691882)

### - BULLETPOINTS OF OPINIONS & TRENDS FORMING AROUND CURRENT EVENTS

- There is a growing belief among developers that traditional blogging is no longer effective as LLMs have changed content consumption habits; many argue that "the blog post is dead" and focus should shift to engaging AI models. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986275654518907209)
- A sentiment is rising about the deadlock in AI race regulations, with some pointing out the potential for the U.S. to splinter under varying state laws, which could slow down innovation. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986256835423383613)
- Observers in the AI community are wary of the growing dominance of automated AIs in various sectors, signaling a transformative impact on digital marketing and influencer culture. [Source](https://x.com/i/web/status/1986202480791986543)
